transcript:
Customer: Hello sir?
Executive: Hmm, sollunga.
Customer: Sir, good evening sir, Krishnan pesaren India martla irunthu.
Executive: Sollunga.
Customer: Sir, namma kaalaila ungaluku unga side la irunthu oru mail check panni paathen naanu. Intha maari enquiries ethume varala apdintra maari sollirunthinga.
Executive: Aama.
Customer: So unga profile me na back end team ku share panni analyze panrathukaga koduthirunthaen. Pesinangala sir, call pannangala? Ippo update paathen call pannirukanga apdintra maari.
Executive: Pannanga. Two months pannanga.
Customer: Okay sir. Actually enna sir aachi ungaluku? Means enna problem? Direct enquiries ethum generate aagalengala?
Executive: Aamanga. Antha alavuku onnum varala. Namma normal plan edukkum pothu eppadi irunthucho account athe maari thaan ippavum irukku.
Customer: Sir, comparative lee neenga vantha puthusileye ungaluku vanthu intha alavuku promotion varrathu apdinna ungaluku vanthu namma keyword promotion basis la thaan nadakkum. So ungaluku athu automatic ave vanthurukku. Basic service leye vanthurukku. Koodave neenga TrustSeal layume neenga vanthu irukirathunala ungaluku September month iruntha athe athavoda ungaluku konjam adhikaama enquiries generate aayirukku. Naan neenga naan ungaluku oru screenshot eduthu anuppi viduren. So intha month starting leye ungaluku oru 76 direct enquiries vanthurukku. Athe maari calls wise paakuringa apdinna oru nine calls intha month receive aayirukangale ungaluku. Athula six calls namma attend pannirukkom. Three calls miss aayirukku.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: So ippo enna naan sir ungaluku vera ethavathu issues neenga irukku face panringa apdinna neenga direct ah ennoda number ku call pannunga illana ennoda manager Krishna sir irukanga avungaloda number kume neenga direct ah call pannunga. Neenga ippo intha maari oru concern maari neenga raise panringa nu vechukkongale atha rectify panra varaikum ungaloda ungaloda visibility neenga maintain panni irukrathu konjam down ah irukkum sir. Yenna athu monitor panrathukku back end team ku thaan unga profile pogum. So ippadi irukrappo namma side la vanthu back fire aagum namma profile oda visibility. Ethavathu issues irukku apdinna neenga tharalama enaku call pannunga illana namma Krishna sir ku avaruke call pannunga. So athu namma profile ku weightage ku entha vitha bathippum erpadatha reethila namma vanthu namma seller problem ah sort out pannikalaam.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Saringala?
Executive: Yes sir, TrustSeal edukkum pothu suppose neraiya online scam nadakkuthu. Ithu TrustSeal service ah iruntha ungaluku atha paathave nambi order koduppangantra maari sonninga.
Customer: Aama sir, kandippa antha maari thaan varum. Ippo neenga enquiries la eppadi namburathu ungalannu thaan kekkuranga.
Executive: But athu vanthu.
Customer: Oh apdingala?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Onnum illa sir, onnum illa. Ippo starting stage la konjam ippadi thaan irukkum. Ungaluku poga poga ungaloda visibility naanum check pannittu thaan irukken. Preferred location konjam namma side la add panna vendiyatha irukku. Preferred location neenga prefer panra location enna enna locationo atha namma prefer la maaranum. Koodave neenga buylead consume panniringala multiple cities la irunthu. Intha idathileye namma company name vanthu konjam project pannanum sir.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: So intha month kaana update innum nammaluku varala. Namma profile kaana update innum varala. Vanthaa naane ungaluku call pannalaamnu thaan irunthaen.
Executive: Hmm. Payment vanthuchu oru 20000 ku but.
Customer: So every month ume.
Executive: Okay payment vanthu eppadi nambi podurathu eppadi namburathu nu kekkuranga.
Customer: Sir neenga sollum pothu TrustSeal verification vanthu nambi vaanguvangantra maari sonninga.
Customer: Okay athu thaan sir ippo customer enna na customer different types of customers iruppanga illingala?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: So ithu onnum illa ungaloda nambikkai ungaloda neenga oru trusted supplier apdintra maariyaana projection already unga profile ku vanthurukku. So appadi irunthum unga customer yen ithunala ippadi panranga ungaloda means antha conversion la thaan intha issues varuthu illingala?
Executive: Hmm. Aama.
Customer: Okay sir antha maari issues ethavathu irukku na neenga call pannunga sir namma atha paathukalaam sir. Enaku antha TrustSeal certificate mattum enaku anuppi vidunga.
Customer: Ungaluku intha ithu varalaingala sir offline la ungaluku vanthu innum varalaingala antha certificate hard copy?
Executive: Innum varalaingale.
Customer: Okay sir athu vanthurum within 45 days kulla thaan ungaluku varum.
Executive: Okay athu thaan sir enaku ithu anuppi vidunga oru photo anuppi vidunga.
Customer: Hmm, seri sir okay sir.
Executive: Atha vena na customer ta vena kaanchi paakaren.
Customer: Ungaluku naan anuppi viduren neenga tharalama neenga atha share pannunga.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Vera ethavathu doubt iruntha neenga tharalama call pannunga sir.
Executive: Hmm, saringa.
Customer: Sir monthly update nammaluku assign aanathu ungaluku naan call panren namma keyword ellame konjam update pannalaam.
Executive: Seri okay.
Customer: Okay sir okay sir.
Executive: Okay. Enaku innum oru photo onnu upload pannum.
Customer: Enna photo sir enna photo?
Executive: Puthu new product onnu.
Customer: New product ah?
Executive: Aama atha upload panni athanoda ithula neenga potruvingala?
Customer: Athe naan potruren sir innum maybe intha week leye ungaluku oru google meet assign aagum. Join pannuvingala neenga google meet la free ah irukinga intha week sir?
Executive: Hmm pannalaanga.
Customer: Okay sir appa naan onnu panren. Vena kupidunga.
Executive: Seri okay sir okay sir. Naan ungaluku google meet assign aanathu ungaluku naan call panren puthu product namma add pannidalaam. Neenga details mattum enaku whatsapp la anuppirunga. Ippo ippo over the call leye ungaluku naan vanthu antha certificate ungaluku naan anuppi vitten.
Executive: Hmm saringa.
Customer: Neenga paaringa. Vanthuruchu.
Executive: Hmm vanthuruchu.
Customer: Okay vanthuruchingala? Antha product oda details me neenga enaku whatsapp la share pannunga naan ungaluku update pannidaren with price oda.
Executive: Hmm saringa.
Customer: Okay sir google meet la namma add pannirukra currently namma catalog la add pannirukra keywords ku konjam mismatching la irukku. Promotion listing la irukra product me konjam promote pannum namma side la athu google meet la namma pannikalaam sir.
Executive: Hmm saringa.
Customer: Okay sir okay sir. So ethavathu iruntha call pannunga ippavum solren ethavathu iruntha call pannunga sir.
Executive: Hmm saringa kandippa.
Customer: Okay okay sir thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not receiving enough direct enquiries.

- Doubts about trusting and making payments.

- TrustSeal certificate not received yet.

- Wants to upload a new product photo.



Resolution:

- Executive shared screenshot of direct enquiries.

- Executive assured TrustSeal builds customer trust.

- Executive confirmed certificate will arrive within 45 days.

- Executive offered to upload new product photo.

- Executive sent soft copy of TrustSeal certificate.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will schedule a Google Meet.

- Customer to share product details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, enquiries, google meet, product upload
